summary: An email from attorney Jeanne M. Christensen providing background information on a woman (name redacted) who met Jeffrey Epstein, including her history, current situation, and photos from around the time of meeting him. The email discusses her speeding violations and a 2006 charge for massage without a license.

persons.name: Jeanne M. Christensen
persons.context: Author of the email, providing background information on a woman who met Jeffrey Epstein. She is an attorney at Wigdor LLP.

events.title: Massage without license charge

events.title: Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The document is an email from attorney Jeanne M. Christensen dated August 17, 2021.
It provides background on a woman who met Jeffrey Epstein, including that she has speeding violations and was charged in 2006 with massage without a license.
Photos are attached that the woman believes are from around the time she met Epstein or shortly after.
The woman's name and specific locations are redacted in the provided text.
The communication is marked as potentially containing confidential or attorney-client privileged information.
